backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing human-written summaries of key frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for home, search, and search results.
frontend/src/components/ResultsList.tsx: Renders search results or empty states with title, host, link, and snippet.
frontend/src/components/SearchForm.tsx: Reusable search form with input, clear button, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with Home/Search nav buttons and copyright attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo and navigation highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth flow, storing identity and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/src/layouts/SiteLayout.tsx: Provides the main site layout with header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/mock/searchDataset.ts: Exports a typed mock dataset of search results used for demo searching.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements a marketing-style home page with hero, CTA buttons, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/SearchHomePage.tsx: Renders the search landing page with logo and search form, routing queries to results.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Runs client-side search against the mock dataset and displays results with a sticky search header.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, container settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and metadata for the IC dapp scaffold and search UI.
